reviews.review_msg: When I asked her to recheck why I got such a low grade, she said I do not know how to calculate percentage and she would deduct my marks further if I will ask for re-evaluation. She gave the same grade to me in both the courses and she teaches at Thompson Rivers Uni now and not at Simon Fraser. God knows if she has a degree or not.

This was the second course I took from her coz there was no other prof. available. She is a prof. at Thompson River Uni now and I don't know why and how she got hired. Gave the same grade to me in both the courses and when I asked her about it she said she would reduce my marks if I will contact her again. Gave the same grade to all the students.
